verses.name: Numbers 21:13
verses.text: From thence they removed, and pitched on the other side of Arnon, which is in the wilderness that cometh out of the coasts of the Amorites: for Arnon is the border of Moab, between Moab and the Amorites.

verses.name: Numbers 21:14
verses.text: Wherefore it is said in the book of the wars of the Lord, What he did in the Red sea, and in the brooks of Arnon,

verses.name: Numbers 21:15
verses.text: And at the stream of the brooks that goeth down to the dwelling of Ar, and lieth upon the border of Moab.
